origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SupplyChainAPI.get_transparency_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves the supply chain transparency data for a specified company over a given number of years, focusing on specific advanced manufacturing technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'ARRAY', 'description': 'An array of advanced manufacturing technologies to focus on, e.g., smart_supply_chain, blockchain.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'transparency_data', 'description': 'The supply chain transparency data for the specified company and technologies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SupplyChainAPI.get_transparency_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Lenovo', 'years'是'3', 'technology'是['smart_supply_chain', 'blockchain'].
